title: Multi-Representation Math Learning Simulation Program for Deaf Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics education program for hearing-impaired professionals, emphasizing visual/tactile learning experiences through BYOD devices and VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between quadratic function graphs and real-world phenomena with 80% accuracy using multimodal (visual/tactile/interactive) tools.
Learners can solve volume calculation problems with 75% accuracy within three attempts by manipulating spatial geometry in VR simulations.
Learners can produce a field problem-solving report applying mathematical concepts through project-based assessment and incorporate peer feedback into the final submission.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
